name: Coloring Book - Halloween
summary:
HALLOWEEN is a funny drawing and coloring app for all ages!
You can enjoy high quality pictures to color and a blank paper page in which you can draw whatever you like!

••• FEATURES
• Funny drawings!
• Video replay
• Easy zoom
• A lot of pictures
• Hours of fun

••• COLORS ARE WAITING!
This app will give you a realistic painting experience. The pictures are not too easy nor too difficult. Enjoy!

••• START DRAWING NOW - WITH HALLOWEEN!
Coloring and drawing is a great way to express your emotions, relieve stress and sharpen creativity.
Thanks to the wonderful world of technology nowadays, you can turn your device into a great coloring book without making a mess at home or wasting papers.
Try it out! Download this app now and see how much you will love it!

••• FREE APP
This is the free version of Coloring Book - Halloween MAX. Some pictures are locked. You can easily unlock all of the features via an in-app purchase.
If you would prefer an app without in-app purchases, please consider downloading the paid version:
Coloring Book - Halloween MAX.
